mapper.insert: insert into user (user_id, user_name, email, password, profile_pic, created_at, updated_at) values (#{userId}, #{userName}, #{email}, #{password}, #{profilePic}, now(), now())
mapper.select: select user_id userId, user_name userName, kakao_id kakaoId, total_thumbs totalThumbs, profile_pic profilePic, refresh_token refreshToken from user order by total_thumbs desc
